ğŸ† Congratulations to Dr. Luong Van Thien and Dr. Vu Huan for winning first place at the Ai City Challenge 2025! ğŸ¥‡

Dr. Luong Van Thien and Dr. Vu Huan from Business AI Lab won first place at the AI City Challenge 2025. The VNPT AI engineering team achieved this remarkable victory in the category of object recognition from ultra-wide-angle camera data on edge devices. Their success demonstrates the strength of Vietnamese AI research and innovation on the global stage.

October 01, 2025

ğŸ‰ Business AI Lab is immensely proud to announce that the AI engineering team from the Vietnam Posts and Telecommunications Group (VNPT) has triumphed as the champion of the AI City Challenge 2025! ğŸ‰

ğŸŒ This is one of the worldâ€™s most prestigious AI competitions in the field of smart cities, attracting more than 30,000 international teams. Continuing their 2024 victory, this year the VNPT team conquered the category of â€œObject Processing and Recognition from Ultra-Wide-Angle Camera Data on Edge AI Devices.â€ ğŸŒ

ğŸ’¡ This challenge involved a highly complex task requiring the AI system to perform real-time processing on compact hardware devices while maintaining high accuracy in object recognition from images with significant distortion. ğŸ’¡

ğŸ¯ This remarkable success is the well-deserved result of the teamâ€™s unity, perseverance, and relentless effort. ğŸ¯

ğŸ‰ Business AI Lab extends its heartfelt and special congratulations to Dr. Luong Van Thien (Head of the Lab) and Dr. Vu Huan for their vital contributions to this outstanding achievement. ğŸ‰

ğŸ’– We wish the professors and the entire VNPT AI engineering team continued success and brilliance in their future endeavors, further affirming the power of Vietnamese intelligence and bringing pride to our nation! ğŸš€
